DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine exercise help improve cancer-related fatigue . Hypothesis : A structured home-based walk progressive resistance exercise program efficacious relieve cancer-related fatigue , prevent aerobic anaerobic deconditioning skeletal muscle wasting , well improve inflammatory cytokine profile breast cancer survivor well receive radiation treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: Fatigue frequently report side effect cancer treatment . Fatigue related cancer treatment different fatigue occur situation specific cause identify . Exercise may may improve type fatigue . The purpose study examine cancer treatment impact normal lifestyle physical activity pattern participation physical activity , well ability walk progressive resistance exercise program reduce cancer-related fatigue breast cancer patient . This study also examine walk progressive resistance exercise program improve factor quality life , depression , anxiety , ability sleep , self esteem , cardiovascular fitness , energy expenditure , muscular strength , muscle mass , immune function ( measured inflammatory cytokine ) .
DOC.criteria: Have primary diagnosis breast cancer , Have functional capacity rating 60 great Karnofsky Performance Scale , assessed oncologist ( physician 's designee ) Be breast cancer survivor ( e.g. , surgery , radiation therapy , chemotherapy , hormone therapy ) . Have life expectancy > 1 year determine patient 's oncologist . Have approval treat physician , study physician ( physician 's designee ) participate submaximal physiological fitness test low moderate homebased walk progressive resistance exercise program . Be able read English . Be 21 year age old . Give informed consent . Have bone metastasis preclude participation exercise program either due symptom pain location bone metastasis . Have physical limitation ( i.e . cardiorespiratory , orthopedic , central nervous system ) contraindicate participation submaximal physiological fitness testing , low moderate homebased walk progressive resistance program , assess PARQ radiation oncologist ( physician 's designee ) Be identify Active Maintenance Stage exercise behavior assess 1item Exercise Stages Change Short Form .
